basics.name: Eduard Malokhvii
basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: 👨‍💻 Inventive Full Stack Developer with over 2 years of wide knowledge in Python, Back-end Development, Web Scraping, Containerisation areas with strong experience in Vue.js, Front-end Development, CI/CD, networking. 🎓 BA & MA in Computer Engineering. 🚵🏊 Active sport participiant, ☕️ coffee adept.

work.name: Self-Employed
work.summary:
🎯 Developed a crawler for olx.ua to obtain detailed information about offers on the platform.

⚡️ Technologies & Environment: Python, Selenium, click, tqdm, pydantic, multiprocessing.

work.name: TenViz
work.summary:
🎯 Developed parsers and crawlers for: investing.com, ishares.com, barchart.com, yahoo.com.

🎯 Developed a fully automated system for creating screenshots of charts for financial reports.

🎯 Developed a service for automated configuration, management, and coordination of Tor proxies.

🎯 Improved performance and quality of various parsers and web crawlers.

🎯 Multitude of bug fixes including emergency cases.

⚡️ Technologies & Environment: Python, PostgreSQL, Selenium, Flask, Swagger, REST, Docker, docker-compose, Markdown, pandas, psycopg2, asyncio, asyncpg, beautifulsoup4, requests, lxml, multiprocessing, Linux, Git, GitLab.

work.name: GlobalLogic
work.position: Apprentice at Linux Kernel GL BaseCamp
work.summary:
🎯 Learned the foundations of development for Linux User Space.

🎯 Learned the foundations of development for Linux Kernel (Virtual file system, Programming interface, Resources, Modules, Dependencies, Loading/unloading, Diagnostics, Debugging, Character device driver, Device Tree, ACPI, Time Management, Memory Management, Interrupts Handling, Concurrency, and Synchronization).

⚡️ Technologies & Environment: C, C++, Make, GCC, Clang, Linux, Linux Kernel, ARM, HAL, STM32CubeIDE, STM32CubeMX, Raspberry Pi, Git.

🔗 See more: www.globallogic.com/ua/gl-basecamp/linux-kernel

🔗 See final project: github.com/malokhvii-eduard/lkmod-bme280
